name: Queen, Hot Space
description: Hot Space is the tenth studio album by the British rock band Queen. It was released on 21 May 1982 by EMI Records in the UK and by Elektra Records in the US.

name: Led Zeppelin, Led Zeppelin III
description: Led Zeppelin III is the third studio album by the English rock band Led Zeppelin, released on 5 October 1970. It was recorded in three locations. Much of the work was done at Headley Grange, a country house, using the Rolling Stones Mobile Studio.

name: Elvis Presley, Elvis' Golden Records
description: Elvis' Golden Records is a compilation album by American rock and roll singer Elvis Presley, issued by RCA Victor in March 1958. It compiled his hit singles released in 1956 and 1957, and is widely believed to be the first greatest hits album in rock and roll history.

name: The Beatles, Abbey Road
description: Abbey Road is the 11th studio album released by the English rock band the Beatles.

name: Elton John, Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
description: Goodbye Yellow Brick Road is the seventh studio album by English singer-songwriter Elton John, first released on 5 October 1973 as a double LP.

name: Michael Jackson, Thriller
description: Thriller is the sixth studio album by the American singer and songwriter Michael Jackson, released on November 30, 1982, by Epic Records.

name: ABBA, Voulez-Vous
description: Voulez-Vous is sixth studio album by the Swedish supergroup ABBA.
